summary: The util package supplies a collection of helper functions for the fapolicy analyzer, covering system user/group retrieval for ACL checks, snapshot creation and cleanup of the fapolicy daemon database, lightweight string case conversion and introspection utilities, filesystem operations such as SHA checksums and file status queries, and resolution of standard XDG base directory paths.
business_intent: To abstract and centralize common systemâ€‘level operations and data handling needed by the fapolicy analyzer, ensuring consistent, reliable access to user/group information, database backups, formatting helpers, file metadata, and configuration locations across environments.
